roleset.name: pull loose with some difficulty

example.name: lexical error
example.text: And [*] try plying [sic]new dollars free in a market that is softening, hurt by a strong dollar and concerned about overcapacity -- the industry's Darth Vadar.
example.arg: in a market that is softening, hurt by a strong dollar and concerned about overcapacity -- the industry's Darth Vadar.

example.name: oddly intransitive
example.text: Then he looked at his finger, at the wrinkled, heavy knuckle and the thick nail he-1 used like a knife [*]-1 to pry up, slit, and open.

roleset.note: PRY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pry' based on sentences in wsj. (from pry.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: look at, illicitly

example.name: your prying eyes
example.text: They surged around him, fingers pointing, eyes prying.

example.name: with sight
example.text: He would tell her [*] not to pry into grownups' affairs -- as though she were a little kid like Elena!

roleset.note: PRY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pry' based on sentences in wsj. (from pry.02-v predicate notes)
